de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.svg

Class SVGHyperCube

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.svg.SVGHyperCube

  • public class SVGHyperCube
extends Object
    Utility class to draw hypercubes, wireframe and filled.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • recDrawEdges

        private static void recDrawEdges(SVGPath path,
                                 double minx,
                                 double miny,
                                 List<double[]> r_edges,
                                 int off,
                                 long[] b)
        Recursive helper for hypercube drawing.
        Parameters:
        path - path
        minx - starting corner
        miny - starting corner
        r_edges - edge vectors
        off - recursion offset (to avoid multi-recursion)
        b - bit set of drawn edges

      • recDrawSides

        private static void recDrawSides(SVGPlot plot,

                                 String cls,
                                 double minx,

                                 int off,
                                 long[] b)
        Recursive helper for hypercube drawing.
        Parameters:
        plot - Plot
        group - Group element
        cls - CSS class
        minx - starting corner
        miny - starting corner
        r_edges - edge vectors
        off - recursion offset (to avoid multi-recursion)
        b - bit set of drawn edges
